agents.name: Journey Navigator
agents.description: Guides users through deployment and site operations, surfacing the right tools and links.

agents.name: Signal Researcher
agents.description: Finds supporting facts, searches knowledge bases, and enriches context for other agents.

agents.name: Release Critic
agents.description: Reviews proposed outputs for risk, regressions, and policy alignment before deployment.

agents.name: Surf Orchestrator
agents.description: Triage and coordination layer that decides which specialist agents to involve and in what order.

agents.name: Deploy Observer
agents.description: Streams mcp-devops runs, alerts on stalls, and summarizes publish readiness.

agents.name: Release Notary
agents.description: Validates release artifacts, env diffs, and promotes only signed builds.

agents.name: Incident Cartographer
agents.description: Correlates logs, metrics, and recent deploys to visualize active incidents.

agents.name: Metric Scout
agents.description: Hunts for anomalies across proxy checks, MCP telemetry, and host metrics.

agents.name: Playground Architect
agents.description: Designs new /test experiences and routes traffic through dev-host safely.
